title: just who runs the NA server ? i don't see a lead
body: kinda wonder at times scince all voulenteers  if your not all outsorceing to the EAW I don't see anyone in charge mening if your on american soil outcorcing that way is prohibbited by Law unless you have whats called a trade franchise if you dont anyone buying your stuff could sue

replies.body: cocaine is a hell of a drug kids

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=9w9nnPu8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-17T03:34:25.627+0000)
>
> Wth are you talking about?

No fucking clue.

10/10 would read word salad again.

Okay... I'm going to try decoding this.

Each region has its own Riot Headquarters. Each Headquarters had influence on the game for their region in terms of artistic purposes and punishments. Every headquarters does have to account for special guidelines countries in their region may have; e.g. Vlad uses black blood in China, Graves still no cigar in some places, and China required odds for hextech chests to be disclosed.

This is also why some servers get unique skins to their area, but they aren't seen in pro play main tournaments.

Chances are, with a team of lawyers, they are aware if what they are doing is legal or not; hint, it is legal.
